author: USA TODAY, Kelly Tyko, USA TODAY
title: What stores are open Easter Sunday 2020? Here's the list of who is open and who will stay closed
description: Is Walmart open on Easter? More stores are closed for Easter because of COVID-19 including Lowe's and Trader Joe's. Here's the list of who is open.
content:
See how many Easter eggs your kids can find in this virtual Easter egg hunt.
USA TODAY
If you forget a key ingredient for your Easter meal Sunday or need more eggs and candy, there are not as many options as in past years.
